mapper.select: SELECT d.seq ,mup.pseq ,mup.path ,mup.uuidName ,d.name ,c.writer_name ,d.sub_title FROM book d join writer c on c.seq = d.bookWriter join memberUploaded mup on mup.pseq = d.seq WHERE 1=1 and d.seq = #{seq}

SELECT d.seq ,mup.pseq ,mup.path ,mup.uuidName ,d.name ,c.writer_name ,d.title ,d.sub_title ,c.writer_exp ,d.publisher ,d.explanation FROM book d join writer c on c.seq = d.bookWriter join memberUploaded mup on mup.pseq = d.seq where 1=1 and d.seq = #{seq}

SELECT fv.seq ,fv.fvName ,c.writer_name ,fv.fvTitle ,fv.fvSub_title ,c.writer_exp ,fv.fvPublisher ,fv.fvExplanation ,fv.fvBookWriter FROM fvBook fv JOIN writer c ON c.seq = fv.fvBookWriter WHERE 1=1} AND fv.seq = #{seq}
SELECT d.name ,tg.keyword FROM tag tg JOIN bookNtag bt ON bt.tagSeq = tg.seq JOIN fvBook fv ON fv.seq = bt.bookSeq where 1=1 and d.seq = #{seq}
SELECT d.name ,tg.keyword FROM tag tg JOIN bookNtag bt ON bt.tagSeq = tg.seq JOIN book d ON d.seq = bt.bookSeq where 1=1 and d.seq = #{seq}
SELECT rev.seq ,d.name ,rev.reviewContents FROM review rev JOIN bookNreview br on br.reviewSeq = rev.seq JOIN book d ON d.seq = br.bookSeq WHERE 1=1 and d.seq = #{seq}
